schoolName: The First High School of Shang Hang
description: I studied in science subject in my high school, I played the role of League branch secretary and my study performance ranked top ten in my class.

My major is Computer Science and Technology. I was excellent in my university, I studied hard and got a high GPA. Due to my excellent comprehensive score, I was recommended to get higher education as a master at Zhejiang University without examing. Besides, I got outstanding graduates in Zhejiang province.
I am Software Engineering student, I love researching in the visualization field, I am attempting to read and write sci-papers to improve my research ability.
